1: I embrace the joy of growth and new beginnings.
2: I choose beauty and connection in my relationships.
3: I live a fulfilling life with time to grow and learn.
4: I embrace the strength and greatness within me.
5: Human creativity can be directed toward greatness and goodness.
6: The creation of humanity inspires deep reflection and emotional connection.
7: Life can inspire creativity and renewal in all living beings.
8: I receive grace and favor in my life.
9: I live justly and walk closely with the divine.
10: I embrace the blessings of family and new beginnings.
11: The earth is renewed through kindness and peace among us.
12: I see the earth thriving with goodness and harmony.
13: I am guided to protect and nurture life on Earth.
14: I build a strong, safe shelter for protection and comfort.
15: I create a safe place of ample space and protection.
16: I create a secure space for safety and harmony.
17: A new beginning emerges from every change on earth.
18: I embrace promises of protection and unity with my loved ones.
19: I bring pairs of every creature to keep them alive.
20: I gather pairs of animals to ensure their survival.
21: I gather food for nourishment and support for all.
22: I follow guidance with dedication and commitment.
